data.title: Q1 results this week: Infosys, Bajaj Finance, Nestle, Eternal, Paytm, Kotak Mahindra Bank among 95 companies to announce earnings
data.description: India Inc's Q1 FY26 earnings season intensifies, with 95 companies set to report results this week. Key players on the radar include Infosys, Zomato, UltraTech Cement, Paytm, Bajaj twins, Nestle India, and Kotak Mahindra Bank. The action kicks off July 21 with firms like CRISIL, Havells, and UltraTech. Market sentiment may hinge on these earnings.
